snippet: The law promises to give Americans with mental illness something they have never had before: near-universal health insurance, not just for their medical problems but for psychiatric disorders as well.
abstract: Under health care reform law, psychiatric benefits will finally achieve parity with other medical coverage; until law's passage, people with mental illnesses and substance disorders have faced stingy annual and lifetime caps on coverage, higher deductibles or simply no coverage at all.
lead_paragraph: The law promises to give Americans with mental illness something they have never had before: near-universal health insurance, not just for their medical problems but for psychiatric disorders as well.
